description:
Takes any component and injects a tooltip when the user hovers
over the component or touch holds it on a mobile device. It also
injects the event listeners and a `tooltip` prop to be added to
the `ComposedComponent`.

If the `tooltipLabel` prop is omitted, the tooltip and event listeners will not
be included.

```js
@param ComposedComponent the component to compose with the tooltip functionality.
@return the ComposedComponent with a tooltip.
```

methods.name: preventContext
methods.docblock: Prevent the context menu from appearing on touch hold.
methods.description: Prevent the context menu from appearing on touch hold.

tooltipPosition.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the `ComposedComponent`.

tooltipDelay.description: The delay before the tooltip appears or disappears.

tooltipTouchTimeout.description: The timeout to use for displaying the tooltip when using a touch device.

onKeyUp.description: An optional onKeyUp function to call along with the tooltip creation onKeyUp.

onBlur.description: An optional onBlur function to call along with the tooltip creation onBlur.

onMouseOver.description: An optional onMouseOver function to call along with the tooltip creation onMouseOver.

onMouseLeave.description: An optional onMouseLeave function to call along with the tooltip creation onMouseLeave.

onTouchStart.description: An optional onTouchStart function to call along with the tooltip creation onTouchStart.

onTouchEnd.description: An optional onTouchEnd function to call along with the tooltip creation onTouchEnd.
